ability.Insatiable Hunger: Boosts Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage whenever it was hit by the opponent.
ability.Intimidating Gaze: On switch-in, Lowers the Attack of the opponent by 1 stage.

Devouring Bite.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Ancient Power.effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target sleep.

Ritual Stomp.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Gluttonous Maw.effect: The user heals 50% of its max HP and raises its Attack by 1 stage.
